You can execute SQL from code—

```python
import sqlite3

cursor = conn.cursor()

cursor.execute("SELECT * FROM users;")
results = cursor.fetchall()

for row in results:
    print(row)

conn.close()
```

> It is the *messenger.*  
> And the database—  
> it is the *oracle.*”
